product_name: Thule Pack'n Pedal Rack Adapter Bracket Magnet
long_description: The Thule Pack'n Pedal Rack Adapter Bracket Magnet is an accessory that lets you attach the magnet included with the Thule Pack'n Pedal Panniers (sold separately) onto an additional bike rack. The Thule Pack'n Pedal Rack Adapter Bracket Magnet worths with virtually any type of bike rack. Versatile design allows for a variety of attachment options.
short_description: The Thule Pack'n Pedal Rack Adapter Bracket Magnet is an accessory that lets you attach the magnet included with the Thule Pack'n Pedal Panniers (sold separately) onto an additional bike rack.
